alert.note: Alert for Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 2:25PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Vilas and northwestern Oneida Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 224 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lac Du Flambeau, or 9 miles southeast of Turtle Flambeau Flowage, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lac Du Flambeau around 235 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Squirrel Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
